alert.note: Alert for Greene; Marengo; Sumter (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 25 at 9:52AM CST until January 27 at 6:00AM CST by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Alabama... Tombigbee River At Gainesville Lock and Dam affecting Sumter, Greene and Marengo Counties. .Flooding continues on the Tombigbee River and a flood warning remains in effect. The next statement will be issued Thursday evening.late tonight at 100 AM CST. && ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM FRIDAY EVENING TO SATURDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Tombigbee River at Gainesville Lock and Dam. * WHEN...From Friday evening to Saturday morning. * IMPACTS...At 101.0 feet, Flooding of low lying agricultural and wooded lands in the area occurs. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:30 AM CST Thursday the stage was 87.9 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 101.0 feet tomorrow evening. - Flood stage is 101.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
